name: TOBEX_ACTIVE
label: TobEx activation
description: TobEx adds a lot to scripts, it should be active to get better results ingame

name: TARGET_ALLEGIANCE
label: Target's allegiance
description: Should always be GOODCUTOFF except for summons and party allies (both cases need a declaration in each script)

name: TARGET_TYPE_COUNT
label: Number of target per type
description: For example, 3 will check the 3 nearest fighters, then the 3 nearest mages, then 3 nearest clerics.

name: TARGET_RANDOM
label: Random target
description: If true, all valid targets get a chance to be selected. Otherwise, first valid target is selected.

name: PROBABILITY_ACTION_SPELL
label: Probability action spell
description: Probability to cast a spell when all triggers are valid.

name: PROBABILITY_ACTION_ITEM
label: Probability action item
description: Probability to use an item when all triggers are valid.

name: CHECK_SPELL_PROTECTION
label: Spell protection check
description: Includes minor globe, spell immunity, spell turning...

name: CHECK_WEAPON_PROTECTION
label: Weapon protection check
description: Includes stoneskin, protection from missile/normal/weapon/magic weapon, mantle...

name: CHECK_ELEMENTAL_RESISTANCE
label: Elemental resistance check
description: Includes fire, cold, electricity, and acid
